My Portfolio

Some of my portfolios due my study at Hacktiv 8

React Game List

Simple game list website built by React JS Library and React Redux.

  • Tech behind project :
  • ✔️React Router
    ✔️React Redux
    ✔️Redux-thunk
    ✔️Redux-logger
    ✔️RESTApi
E-Commerce

Simple e-commerce Website that show Admin and Customer page built by Vue JS as framework.

  • Tech behind project :
  • ✔️ Backend : NodeJS, Express JS, Jest, AWS, Postgres, Sequelize ORM, Bcrypt, JWT, Google Auth Library
  • ✔️ Frontend : Vue Boostrap, Vue Router, Vuex, Vuetify, Axios, RESTApi
  • Admin Login ➡️

Kanban Board

Simple Kanban Board Website built by Vue JS as framework and Postgres as database

  • Tech behind project :
  • ✔️ Backend : NodeJS, Express JS, Jest, AWS, Postgres, Sequelize ORM, Bcrypt, JWT, Google Auth Library
  • ✔️ Frontend : Vue Boostrap, Vue Router, Axios, RESTApi
Fancy Todo

Simple Todo List Website built by Jaquery as framework and Postgres as database

  • Tech behind project :
  • ✔️ Backend : NodeJS, Express JS, Jest, AWS, Postgres, Sequelize ORM, Bcrypt, JWT, Google Auth Library
  • ✔️ Frontend : Jaquery, Boostrap, AJAX
Jump It Loud

This is out Graduation Final Project (team project).
Using Bare React Native as the platform. This game App use Voice Intensity and built by some Library of React Native

  • Tech behind project :
  • ✔️ Backend : Node JS, Mongo DB, Express JS, Jest, AWS
  • ✔️ Frontend : React Native, React Native Game Engine, React Native Sound Level, ASEPRITE
